title: Castle Crashers 1.0.5 apk
description:
Caste Crashers is taking place on a great middle century where invaders are trying to defeat your kingdom. You are king of your castle and it is your respoinsibility to keep the invaders out by picking them up with your finger or slapping giants with touches. It is the best way to keep them out, but if you cannot handle it all alone then you can invite great archers trained in middle earth or call pirates to help to handle the cannons. There are plenty to choose from, feel free to hire builders to keep the castle running and even upgrade the walls.

Invaders are attacking at afternoon, they show no remorse to civilians, they kill everything that keeps blocking their way.
There are many types of enemies starting from slow barbarians and ending up with fast walking giants.

Changelog 1.0.5
Fixed swordmen not picking up right.
Changelog 1.0.4
Fixed crossbowmen not showing up in right position
Reduced prices for archers, crossbowmen and cannons
Changelog 1.0.2
Added instructions
Added new type of enemy
Added pause
Fixed hiscore recording
Fixed fling (a.k.a you can throw the enemy away from your castle)
Reduced some prices in shop
